subject: Leave Request for Personal Work
summary: Rajesh Mishra is requesting a two-day leave from October 12th to 13th for personal work. He assures completion of pending tasks before taking the leave.
summary_spanish: Rajesh Mishra solicita una licencia de dos días del 12 al 13 de octubre por motivos personales. Asegura que completará las tareas pendientes antes de tomar la licencia.

subject: Request for Work From Home on 15th October
summary: Sunita Kumar requests permission to work from home on October 15th due to a medical appointment. She will be available online and complete her work as scheduled.
summary_spanish: Sunita Kumar solicita permiso para trabajar desde casa el 15 de octubre debido a una cita médica. Estará disponible en línea y completará su trabajo según lo programado.

subject: Sick Leave for 3 Days
summary: Anjali Sen is requesting a three-day sick leave from 10th to 12th October due to illness, as advised by her doctor.
summary_spanish: Anjali Sen solicita una baja por enfermedad de tres días, del 10 al 12 de octubre, debido a una enfermedad, según lo recomendado por su médico.

subject: Emergency Leave for a Family Matter
summary: Vikas Nair requests emergency leave starting today due to a family matter, promising to update on his return date and resume work ASAP.
summary_spanish: Vikas Nair solicita licencia de emergencia a partir de hoy debido a un asunto familiar, prometiendo actualizar sobre su fecha de regreso y reanudar el trabajo lo antes posible.

subject: Request for Leave Extension Due to Medical Reasons
summary: Arjun Patel requests a 2-day extension of his leave (until Oct 16th) due to ongoing health recovery. He will provide a medical certificate if needed.
summary_spanish: Arjun Patel solicita una extensión de dos días de su licencia (hasta el 16 de octubre) debido a su recuperación médica en curso. Proporcionará un certificado médico si es necesario.
